name: Sticker Maker Sticker Pack
summary: Learn about .WASTICKERS files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Sticker maker and Sticker Maker Studio allow WhatsApp users to create custom stickers and import those stickers into WhatsApp. After importing their sticker pack, users can add those stickers to WhatsApp messages.

The apps allow users to save and share sticker packs as WASTICKER files. WASTICKERS files are compressed with Zip-compression and typically contain at least three stickers. Each sticker is a 512 x 512 pixel WEBP image with a transparent background. Each sticker pack also includes a sticker tray icon, which is a 96 x 96 pixel PNG image.

instructions: You can open a WASTICKERS file with Viko & Co. Sticker maker (Android) and Sticker Maker Studio (iOS).

If you don't have access to Sticker maker or Sticker Maker Studio but want to view the images a WASTICKERS file contains, you can decompress the file as you would any .ZIP file. For example, you can decompress the file using Corel WinZip for Android, 7-Zip (Windows) or Apple Archive Utility (Mac). Before decompressing your WASTICKERS file, you may have to rename it to use the .zip extension.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
